track.name: I Can Do It with a Broken Heart

wiki.summary: “I Can Do It With A Broken Heart” is the 13th track off Taylor Swift's eleventh studio album, 'THE TORTURED POETS DEPARTMENT'. The song recounts Taylor Swift’s experience touring during a breakup. The song talks about the anxiety & pressure from the tour. Swift’s record-breaking “Eras Tour” began in March of 2023, with an announcement that she and British actor Joe Alwyn broke up after six years of dating in April of 2023. The song became a second single and got a Tour Music Video. Read more on Last.fm.
